channel.title: Custom Spell Book problem
channel.description: Hey, i am currently making a custom spellbook, i have already made and added 1 custom teleport howeva the orig sprite was already added and i fully redid it. I am now wondering, how do i find out the position and all that so i can then add another 1?? please help, thnx.
